title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) for Educational Technology Experimental Research

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the experimental design procedure for educational technology using structural equation modeling (SEM)
Compare and evaluate the advantages of SEM over MANCOVA (e.g., mediation analysis, measurement error estimation)
Practice SEM model construction and interpretation methods to validate educational effectiveness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
